name: evocatively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes you remember or imagine something pleasant: He writes evocatively about nature. The highest peak is the evocatively named Palm Frond Mountain. See
evocative
More examplesFewer examplesThe film evocatively charts a time and place where change has been a long time coming. This is one of the most evocatively beautiful passages in the book.The animated streets of Dublin have been evocatively brought to life by authors, songwriters, and Dubliners themselves.
